name: MERN Stack
description: MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js full-stack application
dockerCompose:
version: '3.8'

services:
  mongodb:
    image: mongo:7
    ports:
      - '27017:27017'
    environment:
      - MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME=admin
      - MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD=password123
    volumes:
      - mongodb_data:/data/db

  backend:
    image: node:20-alpine
    working_dir: /app
    ports:
      - '5000:5000'
    environment:
      - NODE_ENV=production
      - MONGODB_URI=mongodb://admin:password123@mongodb:27017/myapp?authSource=admin
      - PORT=5000
    volumes:
      - ./backend:/app
    command: npm start
    depends_on:
      - mongodb

  frontend:
    image: node:20-alpine
    working_dir: /app
    ports:
      - '3000:3000'
    environment:
      - REACT_APP_API_URL=http://localhost:5000
    volumes:
      - ./frontend:/app
    command: npm start
    depends_on:
      - backend

volumes:
  mongodb_data:
